original_title: Don Vito une affaire de famille
overview: Why armed men broke into a farm to kiss a woman in front of her husband and the young maid suffered the same fate? Why did a so-called minister take care of two sisters and took both of them cuntally and anally? How did the young Ciccio seduce the uptight woman of Don Vito, a godfather whose band of gangster roamed the region? Why did Don Raff√© who was mortally wounded, entrusted a diamond fortune to him? All of these questions are answered in this film where sex, violence and competitions mixes in this explosive cocktail by Marc Dorcel.
title: Don Vito une affaire de famille
